snippet: In the roiling state-by-state war, the campaign against same-sex marriage has been masterminded largely by Frank Schubert, a former corporate public relations executive.
abstract: Former corporate public relations executive Frank Schubert, mastermind behind the national conservative push against same-sex marriage, is now focused on opposing ballot initiatives to legalize the practice in Maryland, Minnesota, Washington State and Maine.
lead_paragraph: In the roiling state-by-state war, the campaign against same-sex marriage has been masterminded largely by Frank Schubert, a former corporate public relations executive.

headline.seo: Frank Schubert and the Fight Against Gay Marriage
headline.main: One Man Guides the Fight Against Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: In the Fight Against Same-Sex Marriage, a Strategist Casts the Issue Anew

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
